column2: Sundance Energy, Inc. engages in exploration and production of oil and gas reserves. The company is headquartered in Denver, Colorado and currently employs 9 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in the exploration for and development and production of oil and natural gas in the United States, and expansion of its portfolio of oil and gas leases in the United States. The firm operates through the oil and natural gas exploration and production in North America segment. The firm's exploration and development activities are focused in the Eagle Ford formation (Texas). The firm has produced approximately 2,652,280 barrels of oil equivalent.
